bibl.title: The Ptolemaic Library Project. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Lecture presented at "The Archimedes Palimpsest Colloquium" held at the Eötvös Collegium, Budapest, 18-22 September 2007. - The library, probably to be dated under Ptolemy I, in its Alexandrian context as a royal project.
bibl.seg: THOMPSON Dorothy J., The Ptolemaic Library Project. Avec résumé en anglais.
